name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lamborghini Veneno: Speed and Elegance in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the Lamborghini Veneno to life with sleek animations and quick access shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy the power and luxury of the Lamborghini Veneno in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Experience the iconic Lamborghini Veneno with stunning visuals and a dynamic aesthetic.
Minimalist Design: A clean and modern interface inspired by the Venenoâ€™s cutting-edge design.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while staying immersed in style.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to further elevate your browsing experience.
